metadata.Name: Polyglot-NER
metadata.Description: This paper introduces Polyglot-NER, a massive multilingual named entity recognition dataset. It covers a wide range of languages and entity types, aiming to advance research in multilingual NLP.
metadata.Paper Title: Polyglot-NER: Massive Multilingual Named Entity Recognition
metadata.Abstract: This paper introduces Polyglot-NER, a massive multilingual named entity recognition dataset. Polyglot-NER contains over 1 million named entity annotations in 150+ languages. We evaluate Polyglot-NER on a variety of multilingual NER models, and show that it significantly improves performance over existing datasets. We release Polyglot-NER to the public to facilitate research in multilingual NER.
